    • Uses of Rule in de.rumford.tradingsystem

      Subclasses of Rule in de.rumford.tradingsystem 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EWMAC
      The EWMAC is a non-binary Rule utilizing the different horizons of its 2 underlying EWMA.
      class  VolatilityDifference
      The VolatilityDifference is a Rule providing forecasts based on historic and recent volatility of the base value.
